newsitem.title: USA: Kmart Corp Q2 July 31 oper net up.
newsitem.headline: Kmart Corp Q2 July 31 oper net up.

text.p: (All Data Above 000s Except Per Share Numbers)
NOTE: Q2 1995 oper results exclude loss of $76.0 million, or $0.17 a share from disposal of discontinued operations, net of tax. Including this loss, net loss was $54.0 million, or $0.12 a share.
(All Data Above 000s Except Per Share Numbers)
NOTE: Six-month 1996 loss from continuing operations excludes loss of $61.0 million or $0.13 a share from disposal of discontinued operations, net of tax.

Six-month 1995 loss from continuing operations excludes loss of $79.0 million or $0.17 a share from disposal of discontinued operations, net of tax. Six-month 1995 oper results also exclude $83.0 million or $0.18 a share after-tax gain from pension curtailment, relating to the freezing of the Kmart defined benefit pension plan.
Including all these items, six-month 1996 net loss was $65.0 million or $0.13 a share vs net loss $82.0 million or $0.19 a share.
